review: Works awesome! Loads movies fast. This works better than my smart tv. Great bargain at $34. Purchased for my parents so they could watch Netflix & Amazon Prime. They are enjoying it.
author: Betsy

review: This was easy to install and no we can get Prime, Netflix, and Hulu Plus in the bedroom where we don't have cable.
author: Socalkayaker

review: Fast accusition but the interface needs and update kinda clunky
author: Claimjumper

review: Love the Fire Stick! We have a Samsung Smart TV, and unfortunately many apps were missing from their App Store. We decided then we would need a streaming device to augment Samsung's shortcomings. After much debate and comparison we settled on the Fire Stick. It's been fantastic! We now have all the apps we could want or need! It's a no brainier with a Prime membership, we love the added features of getting to stream Prime music and see all our Amazon Photos on the TV.
author: Y

review: very prompt, does as programmed,  love it
author: ANTHONY DEORIO

review: I like this much better than Chromecast. All the controls are on screen, I don't have to cast from my phone.
author: Trucker Chris

review: My grandson is enjoying the amazon stick
author: Amazon Customer
